item.title: Greg Work
item.description: Contact greg@gregwork.net Summary Unix Systems Engineer with extensive experience in a wide range of technologies, possessing excellent technical and personal communication skills and an eye for detail. Strong advocate for DevOps methodologies, with a passion for automation and operations. Extensive experience working in technical teams and interfacing with other departments to design, develop and successfully deploy internal and customer-facing projects. Strong knowledge of standard UNIX tools and scripting. Logical and collaborative troubleshooting and fault recovery methodology.
